reviewText:
The film tells the story of how the war on terror is conducted. By the end of it you understand who the real terrorists are.
Describes how the government circumvented the laws that once made America a great nation not the banker run Fascist country it has become.
First hand accounts by the many innocent people that have been since freed show how their jailers are some of the cruelest and confused idiots on the planet. Unfortunately people in the US military don't learn about the Nuremberg trials anymore.
